Hi Cally

Well, it's really because of you (and a couple others) that I am here at
all...so, thank you.

I was trying to get someone to join a couple of the overseas lists
recently and said (something to the effect of)...there are heaps of
Cally's over there...it wa meant as a compliment!

Shell (in NZ)
DS (7) and DD (3)
